title: The Diamond Connection (1984) Action, Adventure | Full Length Movie

sources.title: The Diamond Connection (1984) Action, Adventure | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
Crashed and sunken in a murky sea, a passenger plane had a very special packageâ€¦ a briefcase full of diamonds. These illegally acquired and transported missing diamonds become an irresistible challenge to a few interest groups. They will kill, deceive, and plot to capture the diamonds for themselves.

Original title: Diamanti che scottano 
Director: Sergio Bergonzelli
Writer: Daniel Saunier
Stars: Lorenzo Bonaccorsi, William Berger, Gordon Mitchell
Genres: Action, Adventure, Crime, Thriller
